content.description:
Researchers tested the short-term memory capacity of 12 participants. The number of items that each participant was able to hold in their short-term memory is presented in the table.

Memory Capacity
Participant
Number of Items in Short-Term Memory 
A
3
B
9
C
11
D
8
E
7
F
5
G
8
H
8
I
5
J
6
K
13
L
4
content.question: What is the median number of items held in participants’ short-term memory?

skill.text: 3.B: Calculate and interpret measures of central tendency, variation, and percentile rank in a given data set.
